languages.text:
Each time the Overseer becomes the target of an attack, their Cyber-Mastiff gets stacking temporary Wounds equal to {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}.
While having temporary Wounds, the Cyber-Mastiff has its Hit Chance, Damage, Armor, Dodge, and Parry increased by {uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%.

languages.text:

languages.text:
Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} sea atacado, su cibermastín gana {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
Mientras el cibermastín tenga heridas temporales, su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} aumentan un +{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} %.

languages.text:
每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}受到伤害时，其生化獒犬都会获得{uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，此效果可叠加。
当生化獒犬拥有临时生命值时，它的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%。

当生化獒犬拥有临时生命值时，它的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%。

languages.text:
Dès que son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} subit une attaque, le cyber-mastiff gagne {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Cumulable.
Tant que le cyber-mastiff a des blessures temporaires, ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}, ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts infligés{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} sont augmentés de +{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} %.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} saldırıya uğradığında siber mastifi, {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
Siber mastif, geçici sağlık puanına sahipken {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g}, verilen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri +%{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} artar.

languages.text:
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} атакуют, его кибермастиф получает {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
Пока у кибермастифа есть временное здоровье, его {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g}, наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} увеличены на {uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g} が攻撃されるたび、そのサイバースティフは{uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g} を得る。スタックする。
サイバー・マスティフが一時的な傷を負っている間、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}与えるダメージ{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリー{/g} が+{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%増加する。

サイバー・マスティフが一時的な傷を負っている間、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}与えるダメージ{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g} 、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリー{/g} が+{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}%増加する。

languages.text:
Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} angegriffen, erhält sein Cyber-Mastiff {uip|Mastiff STR Bonus|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Stapelbar.
Hat der Cyber-Mastiff temporäre Wunden, erhöhen sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}, sein verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} um +{uip|Mastiff tHP|582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32} %.
